story: SketchStitch – Illustrated Embroidery Kits started from the idea that beautiful, beginner-friendly embroidery kits with original art. Our goal is to bring this vision to life by combining innovative design, community input, and high-quality execution.
company_description: SketchStitch is a passionate team dedicated to excellence in crafts. With a track record of creativity and performance, we aim to exceed backer expectations.

what_will_you_get.reward: Thank-you email and your name on our backers page.
Digital wallpaper and project update access.
Early bird special: one unit of the product or digital copy.
Product/digital copy + limited edition merch.
Deluxe package: product, merch, plus backer-exclusive updates.
Premium package: all above + invitation to a virtual meet-and-greet.
VIP backer: behind-the-scenes access and founder Q&A session.

risks_and_challenges: While we have experience and solid plans, unexpected delays in production or shipping may occur. We are committed to transparency and will keep backers updated on any challenges.
